subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ratings increased 12 percent for the second Winter Classic, in which Detroit defeated Chicago, 6-4, on Thursday at Wrigley Field. NBC earned a 2.9 overnight rating, the best for an N.H.L. regular-season game in nearly 13 years. Each overnight rating point represents about 735,000 TV homes.
